replies.bodyText:
After some thinking, it's probably best to have two tags:
CHEST_SLOT, and CHESTPLATE (or an alternative name for the former).
It isn't instantly obvious that an elytra would be a chestplate but it would be helpful to know which materials can be used in the chest slot.
replies.author: Draycia

replies.bodyText:
Same should go with turtle shell in helm slot.

replies.bodyText: The Turtle Shell is already included, its material is TURTLE_HELMET and so it automatically gets added to helmets with the rest of them.
